DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate short-term long-term efficacy two preventative intervention approach design support middle school youth .
DOC.detailed_description: This study involve two part : Part 1 entail screen 7th 8th grader 4 public middle school identify student may show moderate sign stress . Students score designate cutoff depression symptom measure receive brief check-in determine eligibility follow randomize trial ( Part 2 ) . An `` indicated '' sample 120 adolescent 7th 8th grade caregiver randomly assign brief , Individual Support Program ( ISP ) comparison group Skills Group Program . Research interview conduct multiple timepoints student caregiver , teacher questionnaire use examine change outcome measure . Following completion intervention , participant follow 12-months .
